ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok.  Thanks for the info. I was wondering because it seems that as I gain level (within a circle of spells), toward the end of that circle I cast a higher
ygData.messageBody:
Ok. Thanks for the info.

I was wondering because it seems that as I gain level (within a circle of
spells), toward the end of that circle I cast a higher level pet more often
than a lower level pet.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Barry Senowitz [mailto:barrys@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 8:28 AM
> To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
>
>
> From: Barry Senowitz <barrys@...>
>
> skill only effects the chances of a successful cast
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nat Russo [mailto:nrusso@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 9:07 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancers
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Oh yes.....another pet question :)
>
>
> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>
> Is the level of pet you summon related in any way to your
> conjuration skill?
> Or does your conjuration skill only determine your chances of a successful
> cast?
>
> Thanks
> Mujahid 23 Necro Solusek Ro
>
>

> tolerated
